# moodleR

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/moodleR)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=moodleR)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of moodleR is to facilitate access to and manipulatin of Moodle&trade; data for learning analytics practitioners. Moodle is a widely used open source learning management system (LMS). For more information about Moodle go to [www.moodle.org](http://www.moodle.org).

## Installation

You can install the released version of moodleR from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("moodleR")
```
